archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0141
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want to implement measures to stop customers abusing interest free payments in a subscription world, so I can reduce my risk of bad debt

properties.value: We should force start billing cycle if no ‘first use’ within 7 days of dispatch. We should immediately put customer into collections if they port out with IFP bal remaining

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
